# Beep 64

First use the `dtmf-decoder` to extract the numbers from the give audio file.

{% embed url="https://github.com/ribt/dtmf-decoder" %}

After that replace the quotes with empty spaces. You can do this by using the following command.

<figure><img src="../../.gitbook/assets/Untitled 3.png" alt=""><figcaption></figcaption></figure>

Next copy the code and use this following script to decode the sms code ( [https://www.dcode.fr/multitap-abc-cipher](https://www.dcode.fr/multitap-abc-cipher) )

```python
smscode = "8 44 33 333 555 2 4 444 7777 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 7777 7 2 222 33 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 7777 7 2 222 33 9999 33 777 66 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 7777 7 2 222 33 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 7777 7 2 222 33 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 7777 7 2 222 33 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 7777 7 2 222 33 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 9999 33 777 666 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 7777 7 2 222 33 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 9999 33 777 666 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33 7777 7 2 222 33 9999 33 777 666 7777 7 2 222 33 666 66 33"

smscodeDict = {
    2:"A",
    22:"B",
    222:"C",
    3:"D",
    33:"E",
    333:"F",
    4:"G",
    44:"H",
    444:"I",
    5:"J",
    55:"K",
    555:"L",
    6:"M",
    66:"N",
    666:"O",
    7:"P",
    77:"Q",
    777:"R",
    7777:"S",
    8:"T",
    88:"U",
    888:"V",
    9:"W",
    99:"X",
    999:"Y",
    9999:"Z",

}

word = ""

for each in smscode.strip().split(' '):
    word += smscodeDict[int(each)]
print(word.lower())
```

Output of the above script.

<figure><img src="../../.gitbook/assets/Untitled 4.png" alt=""><figcaption></figcaption></figure>

Now replace all the “`space`”, “`one`”, ”`zero`” keywords with “ ”, “`1`”, “`0`” respectively.

{% code overflow="wrap" %}
```
# Output after replacing


```
{% endcode %}

Now ignore the string “theflagis” and put the remaining string in cyber chef and use the mentioned recipe to get the flag.

<figure><img src="../../.gitbook/assets/Untitled 5.png" alt=""><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
